description: It's Manchester derby weekend - so who would you pick in your combined Man Utd and Man City XI?
title: Manchester United v Manchester City: Pick your combined XI here
title_page: Manchester United v Manchester City: Pick your combined XI here - BBC Sport
maintext:
It is the Manchester derby this weekend with United and City going head to head at Old Trafford.
City sit fifth and United are 13th before Sunday's game - both far below the positions they would like to be in.
We want to know who you would pick from a combined Manchester XI. How many United players make it in?
Pick your XI below and share it with your friends on social media.
